application

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing camera position and rotation and adjusting it. Used in the renderer.
    Author:
    Sam Dark
    See Also:
    Renderer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Position position
      The position of the camera in 3d space
      private Rotation rot
      The rotation of the camera about x,y and z axis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(double x, double y, double z, double rotX, double rotY, double rotZ)
      Creates a camera object with initial position and rotation values

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position getPosition()
      Gets the cameras position in the world
      Rotation getRotation()
      Gets the x y and z axis rotations of the camera
      void incRotX(double inc)
      Increases the cameras x axis rotation by an input value
      void incRotY(double inc)
      Increases the cameras y axis rotation by an input value
      void incRotZ(double inc)
      Increases the cameras z axis rotation by an input value
      void incX(double inc)
      Increases the cameras x position by an input value
      void incY(double inc)
      Increases the cameras y position by an input value
      void incZ(double inc)
      Increases the cameras z position by an input value

      • Camera

        Camera(double x,
       double y,
       double z,
       double rotX,
       double rotY,
       double rotZ)
        Creates a camera object with initial position and rotation values
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position
        y - Initial y position
        z - Initial z position
        rotX - Initial x axis rotation
        rotY - Initial y axis rotation
        rotZ - Initial z axis rotation

        public void incRotX(double inc)
        Increases the cameras x axis rotation by an input value
        Parameters:
        inc - The amount to increase by, negative decreases
